Entertainments Contest
The Dome Leisure Park, Doncaster, South Yorkshire, England, UK Music adjudicators (in mark order shown in notes): Trevor Walmsley, Bram Gay, James Scott Entertainment adjudicators: Peter Rutterford, John Ware
25 minutes free concert programme.
Prizes: 1st: £5000 + The National Westminster Bank Championship cup 2nd: £2500 + The National Westminster Bank Festival Trophy 3rd: £1000 + The National Westminster Bank Cup 4th: £500 Best Soloist: £100 + The National Westminster Bank Soloist Trophy - John Hudson, Britannia Building Society
